name: Care-Robot 2000
description:
Care-Robot 2000 is my first game. I made it for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6, the theme was "Take Care".

Story:

The year is 2030, Earth is a wasteland. The survivors can't leave their homes because the air is toxic.

You are Care-Robot 2000, designed to take care of the survivors. It's your objective to bring them supplies, so they can survive another day.
